title: 1+1 Rune Page
body: I bought the a rune page for 6300 ip few days ago and just 1+1 rune page event was started. Would you mind compensate a extra rune page to my account please? I am so depressed that the event was started just few days after I bought the rune page. :(

replies.body:
Hmmm... I can't make any promises, but if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and link this boards post in it, we'll take a look and see what we can do.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
